website_summaries.verdict: A cut above the rest — you’ll be hard pressed to find a night cream that plumps your skin like Clinique’s.
pros: The search for supple skin ends here
This paraben free, fragrance free, non-comedogenic night cream works for a plethora of skin types
Popular across all ages, and acne-sufferers rave about their skin improvements
cons: Few users report drier skin after use

customer_reviews.title: This product works!  I've used it for years!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a night cream, and it really works! I am 75 years old, and lots of people ask to what I attribute my lack of facial wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Cook

customer_reviews.title: BEST OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: You can use day or night as it’s super moisturizing and rich but never heavy or greasy. It’s sooo great on sensitive skin. No smell, nothing to hurt you. Use it 2x a day and couldn’t live without it. Superior product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Koppelman

customer_reviews.title: Clinique turnaround overnight.
customer_reviews.text: This always makes my face feel so much better in the morning. Not greasy when applied. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Annsp@tds

customer_reviews.title: Really, really good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good night time moisturizer. Doesn't leave the skin greasy either! This works better on my dry skin than any of the other Clinique moisturizers I've bought. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great night lotion
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this lotion for a couple of years now. I love that I can find it easily on Amazon. I hate going to the mall, so it is so nice to get what you need without leaving the comfort of your home, especially during Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love it, leaves my skin super soft and the next morning I can still feeling it’s on my face, not greasy or uncomfortable, it’s really good and love how soft leaves my skin
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way. Great product for money.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Face feels GREAT. Nice and Bright. Even makes 66 yr old face look younger.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Still a great working product
customer_reviews.text: I have revisited this product from years past. Still one of the better products made today. Better value than the higher priced "new" facial products that are out on the market today. It still works great and II will use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Maite Brown

customer_reviews.title: Right amount of moisture without that oily feel!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only moisturizing cream I will ever buy so I'm hoping they make this forever! I used to struggle with acne as a teenager and I barely got rid of it last year at 31yo so I'm excited that this helps to maintain moisture without wreaking havoc on my combination oily skin! Everyone thinks I'm 10 years younger than I am so trust me, this is an AMAZING addition to your skincare routine! This is my favorite lil secret, buy one jar and you'll never look back <3
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, and Absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, and I use it with a serum. It is lightweight, and absorbs into the skin quickly. It doesn't feel greasy at all, and since it absorbs fast, it doesn't end up on your pillow! I will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Manavian

customer_reviews.title: Different formula
customer_reviews.text: Clinique has apparently changed the formula - it's not as light as it used to be, but still a good facial cream. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jht927

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer I have found. I use it day and night. My skin is very sensitive and this does not cause acne for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna L.

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is the very best, it is smooth yet gentle on the skin. I use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Norma M. Barr

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is OKAY
customer_reviews.text: Does not work miracles, but moisturizes well and doesn’t break me out.
customer_reviews.author: Squeezy

customer_reviews.title: It woks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and it feels good on my Face Overall I like it
customer_reviews.author: Fahim Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Clinique
customer_reviews.text: I love how this overnight moisturizer makes my skin feel. I can definitely see and feel a change in my skin since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: William Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not to heavy. Not to lite.
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is light enough to wear during the day with my dry skin but is perfect for night. It is not greasy and I have experienced no breakouts. I have tried the equivalence of Estée Lauder and found the same quality in this moisturizer and not as expensive. I will be using this moisturizer from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Karon Tredway

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see any rejuvenation, but it’s a good moisturizer for everyday .
customer_reviews.author: Dwain & Patricia Landry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and only use Clinique. This price definitely beats the department store price.
customer_reviews.author: CRF

customer_reviews.title: Night lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion! It feels really good and helps with wrinkles and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this makes my face feel! Moisturized and silky smoothly. Not oily or greasy. Feels refreshed in the morning. Will continue use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you can get a better one for less
customer_reviews.text: i mean yea it adds a little moisture. it’s really thick.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing..
customer_reviews.text: My skin is flawless.. exfoliate the skin daily and leaves it soft with a flawless results
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great night cream!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream, my skin is so soft in the mornings!
customer_reviews.author: Amalia E. Nazario

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the hype is all about but doesn’t live up to the expectations. I have really dry skin and this didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer it is light and airy. Very nice for daily use
customer_reviews.author: meredith w gross

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: For night time this is hands down the best moisturizer I have ever used. So gentle, and really does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Petsche

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Will return this product today at Kohl’s. Received without Clinique box and looks messy when opened. It’s questionable what’s inside!!!
customer_reviews.author: Normie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying the turnaround night cream. Not oily and leaves my face feeling smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Iannon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time, love the Turnaround cream
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as the cream I purchase at Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: Adlh75

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream
customer_reviews.text: Works well to mositurize when skin is going through a dry phase eg change in season
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Mama

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer and much more!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and love everything about it but the price. I have fair skin that burns easily and dries out in lines around my mouth and eyes, and especially my neck. I have used Cliniques three step process twice daily, followed in the morning by Superdefense Moisture with SPF 20, and in the evening with Turnaround Overnight revitalizing moisturizer. It makes a difference you can see, with smooth more radiant skin. Don’t forget to put it on your neck! I know it’s expensive, but I’m worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several months and like it very much. It's not greasy and having a cream on my face overnight I thought my skin would breakout. It doesn't. It keeps my skin balanced with the right level of moisturizer for overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I work outside most of the time skin is really dry. I love this product because I keep it in the refrigerator and after I wash my face and put it on at night before I go to bed my skin feels great in the morning
customer_reviews.author: mena anacleto

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing for a good night sleep
customer_reviews.text: I am doing Retin A treatment these days, and saw a recommendation on YouTube about this night cream. Turns out pretty impressive and helped my skin stay balanced while the Retin A doing its work. So far so good after 2 month.
customer_reviews.author: iDOBBi

customer_reviews.title: Felt no difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try Clinique because of their reputation of having good skin products. I was very disappointed to find no difference in the moisture of my skin or any improvement of the fine lines and wrinkles on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Evans

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: I used this brand for many years and bought this cream for my daughter in law who says she likes its consistency and keeps her skin moist through the winder days and the dry home environment.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this product for many years through Clinique website but recently started ordering from Amazon. They were more economical and they shipped quickly! Will continue Amazon ordering.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Jar was opened. Returning product.
customer_reviews.text: Product jar arrived opened. It looked like somebody had stuck their finger in the cream. Returning and asking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vivie1

customer_reviews.title: good moisture
customer_reviews.text: Best I've tried, this product is so comfortable on my skin. Looks fab next morning too!
customer_reviews.author: DIANNA L. SILVERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years. I have sensitive skin and it’s soothing. I even used this in am pinch for my daughters sun burn and you could see the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: asiler240

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and it was exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Clinique Turnaround night cream is a wonderful light weight moisturizer. Have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. H

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: have been using this product for years. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love it!💙❤💚
customer_reviews.text: Very good product!!..so wonderful for your skin..it gobbles it up!!
customer_reviews.author: loraine

customer_reviews.title: Loved this to start
customer_reviews.text: Loved this to start, but I use it less now that I have figured out more about my skin. You MUST exfoliate if you use this. My skin hates everything and this worked great. Started the three step system so I use the night cream less but still enjoy it on occasion. For the price, I'd suggest you make sure you're going to use it more than occasionally
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gray

product_meta.title: Clinique Turnaround Overnight Revitalizing Moisturizer for Women, 1.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: This is a gently clears the dulling effects of time and sun damage, nourishes with moisture. A revitalizing moisturizer that plumps, smooths, and helps to skin glow overnight.
feature_bullets: A revitalizing moisturizer that plumps, smooths, and helps to skin glow overnight

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
